message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $10000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose a special introductory price of $15000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering the product's capabilities. I look forward to discussing how it can best serve your needs.
